sentences.sContent: Scientists have found some clues, for example the effect of auxin in the process.
sentences.sContent_eng: Scientists have found some clues, for example the effect of auxin in the process.
sentences.sCn: 科学家已经发现了一些线索，例如植物的生长素在这个过程中起到的作用。

trans.tranOther: any of various plant hormones, such as indoleacetic acid, that promote growth and control fruit and flower development
